title: Revert POS UI to remove QR-code-based custom credit cards and scanner flow

requirements.text: Remove the QR-code-based Custom Credit Cards feature from the main navigation by deleting the "Cards" tab and its screen from the app UI.

quotes: Um, go back to the normal design. I don't like the QR code thing anymore.

acceptanceCriteria: The top-level tabs no longer include a "Cards" tab.
Navigating the app does not render CustomCreditCardsScreen anywhere.
The tab layout (e.g., grid columns) is updated so spacing/alignment remains correct.

requirements.text: Revert the Checkout dialog so it no longer offers a QR-based credit card payment method and no longer uses the in-app QR scanner flow.

quotes: go back to the normal design
I don't like the QR code thing anymore.

acceptanceCriteria: The payment method list in CheckoutDialog does not show "QR Credit Card".
CheckoutDialog does not render QRCardPaymentPanel and does not attempt to start/stop camera scanning.
Completing a purchase works using the remaining payment methods (e.g., Fake Cash and Gift Card) without referencing QR/card token validation.

requirements.text: Remove unused QR/custom-card frontend modules and dependencies from the build after the UI is reverted (components, hooks, and imports related to custom QR credit cards and scanning).

quotes: I don't like the QR code thing anymore.

acceptanceCriteria: No remaining imports/reference usages of useCustomCreditCards, QRCodeBadge, CustomCreditCardsScreen, or QRCardPaymentPanel from active app code paths.
The frontend TypeScript build completes without unused/failed import errors related to removed QR/custom-card modules.
No network requests are made to the Google Charts QR code URL from the running app.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (Shadcn components are read-only).
Do not edit any files listed in frontend.immutablePaths in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Removing or migrating existing backend state related to custom credit cards (backend can keep existing data; the feature should simply be removed from the UI/flow).
Adding new payment providers or real payment processing.
